<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<style>
#title-block-header {
  display: none;
  padding: 0px;
}

body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  background-color: #050505;
  color: #fff;
}

.quarto-color-scheme-toggle {
  display: none;
}

h1 {
  border: none;
}

a:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}

.hero-banner {
  display: flex;              
  align-items: center;        
  justify-content: center; 
  min-height: 100vh; 
  width: 100%;    
  padding: 20px;
  
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;  
  z-index: 1;
}

.hero-banner::before,
.hero-banner::after {
  content: '';
  position: fixed;
  width: 60vw;   
  height: 60vw; 
  border-radius: 50%;
  filter: blur(100px); 
  opacity: 0.15; 
  z-index: -1; 
}

.hero-banner::before {
  background: #4D64E8; 
  top: -20%;
  left: -20%;
}

.hero-banner::after {
  background: #F97316;
  bottom: -20%;
  right: -20%;
}

.hero-header {
  display: flex;
  flex: 1;
  flex-direction: column;
  
  align-items: flex-end;
  text-align: right;
  max-width: 600px;
  padding: 30px;
  justify-content: center;
}

.hero-title {
  font-size: 55px;          
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 1.1;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  color: white;
}

.hero-subtitle {
  font-size: 25px;
  color: #cccccc;            
  margin-bottom: 40px;        
}

.logo {
  color: #F97316;             
  margin-right: 15px;         
}

.btn-start {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 15px 30px;
  width: auto;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: white;
  border: 2px solid #fff;  
  background: rgba(77, 100, 232, 0.1); 
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.btn-start:hover {
  background: #FF6500;        
  box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(77, 100, 232, 0.5);
}

.image-container {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  max-width: 600px;
  padding: 30px;
}

.image-container img {
  width: auto;
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  max-height: 500px;
  border-radius: 8px; 
}

@media (max-width: 1100px) {
  .hero-title {
    font-size: 40px; 
  }
  .hero-subtitle {
    font-size: 20px;
  }
  .hero-banner {
    padding: 0 5%; 
  }
}

@media (max-width: 800px) {
  .hero-banner {
    flex-direction: column; 
    height: auto; 
    padding-top: 100px;
    padding-bottom: 50px;
  }

  .hero-header {
    align-items: center; 
    text-align: center;
    max-width: 100%; 
  }

  .image-container {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center; 
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 450px; 
  }

  .image-container img {
    width: auto;
    height: auto;
    max-height: 350px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 400px) {
  .hero-banner::before,
  .hero-banner::after {
    width: 80vw;
    height: 80vw;
    filter: blur(80px); 
  }

  .hero-banner::before {
    top: -10%; 
    left: -20%;
  }

  .hero-banner::after {
    bottom: -10%;
    right: -20%;
  }

  .hero-banner {
    flex-direction: column-reverse;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
  }
  .hero-header {
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
  }
  .hero-title {
    font-size: 32px; 
  }
  .hero-subtitle {
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  .btn-start {
    width: 100%; 
    text-align: center;
  }
  .image-container {
    display: none;
  }
}
</style>

```{=html}
<div class="hero-banner">
  <div class="hero-header">
    <h1 class="hero-title"> <span class="logo">[>]</span>Programming Concepts Course</h1>
    <p class="hero-subtitle">Курс з основ програмування для початківців</p>
    <a href="modules/about-the-course.qmd" class="btn-start">Перейти до курсу!</a>
  </div>

  <div class="image-container">
    <img src="images/hero-img.png" alt="Programming Concepts">
  </div>
</div>
```
